short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Validate GDPR compliance of any website in seconds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GDPR Validator is an extension that will validate the compliance* of your website with the GDPR regulation, in seconds.

Open the extension, click on the analyze button and done! You know if your website is compliant*

Want to know more about it? No worries, we freely provide a more detailed analysis of your website, listing all the issues it has.

*GDPR Validator cannot guarantee 100% accuracy, as it tests only few elements (see full report) - and GDPR is more than that.
